explains: v. 拆开，拆卸；废除，取消；去掉……的覆盖物

sentences.en: They decided to dismantle the machine and start again from scratch.
sentences.cn: 他们决定拆掉机器，从头再来。

sentences.en: He asked for immediate help from the United States to dismantle the warheads.
sentences.cn: 他向美国请求即时援助，拆除弹头。

sentences.en: I had to dismantle the engine in order to repair it.
sentences.cn: 我得把发动机拆开来修理。
